title: The Colnago Steelnovo Is a 3D-Printed Steel Bike Celebrating 70 Years
content:
Colnago is releasing a 70-piece limited run of modern steel bikes called the Colnago Steelnovo to celebrate the brand's 70th anniversary.

Read the full article at The Colnago Steelnovo Is a 3D-Printed Steel Bike Celebrating 70 Years on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
